## Abstract

The San Francisco City Employee Compensation dataset has a record of about 102,660 employees. The amount of salary, benefits, and compensation they receive depend on their job and what departments it lies under.


### 1. Discovery and Data Preparation

The San Francisco City Employee Compensation dataset gives a look of how the city jobs are organized and how much workers get paid.
